61 class Timer {
62 public:
63  Timer() {
64  reset();
65  }
66  void reset() {
67  m_timestamp = std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
68  }
69  float diff() {
70  std::chrono::duration<float> fs = std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now() - m_timestamp;
71  return fs.count();
72  }
